list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a large keyboard musical instrument with a wooden case enclosing a soundboard and metal strings, which are struck by hammers when the keys are depressed. The strings' vibration is stopped by dampers when the keys are released and can be regulated for length and volume by two or three pedals.
a passage marked to be performed softly.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the choir addresses the saint piano in Polish, then fortissimo in Latin
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Congol giải quyết các Saint Piano trong tiếng Ba Lan, sau đó là Fortissimo ở Latin

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: in piano singing her tone remains pure
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Trong piano hát giọng điệu của cô ấy vẫn còn tinh khiết
